column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " Hello Republic Cit - ay !
#Text=Well done , she seems very threatening .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh no no , that 's Kuvira , she 's kind of my boss .
#Text=" Eska says : " Boss , girlfriend .
#Text=Same thing .
#Text=" Cam says : " I 'm afraid there 's been a mistake , Your Eminence .
#Text=We have you and your brother booked in the same room , with only one bed .
#Text=" Eska says : " It 's no mistake .
#Text=Desna sleeps in the tub .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Never thought I 'd be allowed back in the Republic City Four Elements .
#Text=Raiko must have turned purple when Kuvira made him pardon me of my alleged crimes .
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " You 're an upstanding citizen again , sir .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Upstanding is right !
#Text=And do n't forget to fill the extra bag with as many of those little soaps as you can grab .
#Text=Love the lavender scent .
#Text=" Mako says : " Bolin !
#Text=Look at you !
#Text=My little brother got all ... important .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I know , right ?
#Text=I see myself in the mirror sometimes and I think I 'm in trouble before I realize : it 's only me .
#Text=" Mako says : " So , what 's it like working for Kuvira ?
#Text=From what I 've heard , she 's pretty harsh .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No !
#Text=I — I mean , she can be tough , sure , but we 're turning around the Earth Kingdom like you would n't believe !
#Text=You remember how bad Grandma 's neighborhood in Ba Sing Se was ?
#Text=All that 's completely changed , I mean , we are really ... helping people .
#Text=But what have you been up to ?
#Text=Fighting crime ?
#Text=Busting triads ?
#Text=Chasing the ladies , Mako - style ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Well , I 've been working for Wu .
#Text=And , uhhh ... Yeah .
#Text=" Bolin says : " So , have you seen Korra yet ?
#Text=" Mako says : " No .
#Text=She was supposed to come in with Tonraq , but he said she left the South Pole months ago .
#Text=No one knows where she is .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Mother .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Hello , Baatar Jr. " Baatar Jr. says : " It 's just " Baatar " now .
#Text=So , now that you 've seen all the good we 've done since we left Zaofu , you must be sorry that you did n't come and help us .
#Text=" Suyin says : " I do n't know if I 'd call marching all over the Earth Kingdom , forcing people to bow to Kuvira , " doing good " .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " You 're going to have to get over your grudge with her .
#Text=I 'm sure you 've heard that we 're engaged .
#Text=She 's going to be an official member of our family .
#Text=" Suyin says : " I 'm just glad she 'll be stepping down after tomorrow .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " You prefer to be ruled by that royal idiot ?
#Text=" Wu says : " I hope I 'm not out of order saying this : You 're pretty easy on the eyes for a military type .
#Text=I 'll put in a good word for you with the hotel staff , maybe get you a little upgrade .
#Text=I 've been living here for years , they love me .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " I wo n't be needing your help .
#Text=We 've reserved the presidential suite .
#Text=" Wu says : " Well , I think someone is pulling your chain , gumdrop !
#Text=See , I 'm in the presidential suite .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Not anymore .
#Text=I had you moved out .
#Text=" Wu says : " Wait , what ?
#Text=Cam , where 's all my stuff ?
#Text=" Cam says : " We 've moved you into a very nice junior suite on the seventh floor .
#Text=" Wu says : " Junior suite ?
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Something you should know about me : I always get what I want .
#Text="
